mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(tl.tNum) as tagCount, tw.tagNum, tw.tagName FROM tagWord tw LEFT JOIN tagLog tl ON tw.tagNum = tl.tagNum GROUP BY tw.tagNum

SELECT l.tNum, l.tTitle, u.userNick, date_format(l.writeDate, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i")writeDate FROM travelLog l JOIN user u ON l.userNum = u.userNum ORDER BY tNum DESC LIMIT ${param1.postsPerPage} OFFSET ${param1.offset}

SELECT b.boardNum, b.boardContent, u.userNick, date_format(b.writedate, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i")writedate FROM board b JOIN user u ON b.userNum = u.userNum ORDER BY boardNum DESC LIMIT ${param1.postsPerPage} OFFSET ${param1.offset}
